title: LFM - Subs (Jg, Mid, Adc)
body:
Hey guys I'm Deep Sanity,
So im looking for subs for a ranked team for silver+ only maybe high bronze for some exception.
We have only just started this ranked team and we are still in provisionals.
I have an experience in ranked teams, i have been playing in teams since late s3.
I am Silver 4 and heading up, but i have alot more to improve in and i think it would be better in a team.
also communication will be a vital in this team so we will use either skype teamspeak or curse.
i will make up a schedule for when games will be made if needed.

Top - Taken
Jungle - Taken - Sub Needed
Mid - Taken - Sub Needed
Adc - Taken - Sub Needed
Supp - taken

Feel free to add me in game or just make a post in here - Thanks :)
- Deep Sanity

replies.body: i can sub for mid, feel free to add me

Hey I'm a adc/mid main and I would like to sub for adc or mid I am sliver 4, my main adc's are Draven, lucian, Quinn and ez, my main mid laners are Annie, jayce, lb, Quinn and abit of ziggy,  if you are interested in having me as a sub add Twisted S I D

Ps I habe team speak, Skype and curse voice I don't mind which one is used

How often do you need the subs and when? I wouldn't mind joining a team but I can only be on at specific times, especially during school. I main mid, I'll need to expand my champion pool but I this would give me even more reason to. And, just out of curiosity, would you be willing to share the ranks of the other team members? I understand if no.
I can become a sub for jg. Im a high bronze who can play lots of jungle champs
